info.description: Test Create Assessment for contact form (action: contact). Set collection variables: gcp_project_id, recaptcha_site_key. Set Auth Bearer token and recaptcha_token from the contact page.

request.description: Creates an assessment for a contact-form token. Set collection variables gcp_project_id and recaptcha_site_key. Use Bearer token from gcloud auth print-access-token. Get recaptcha_token from the contact page console (grecaptcha.enterprise.execute with action 'contact').
